problems in your life,

1743.07.text: we encourage you to come forward

1746.33.text:
for prayer and for ministry and since
you're sitting up closer it's a lot less

1750.66.text: walk, you know, just a few steps down

1753.47.text:
and if you also need Christ's rescue
plan to deal with your sins

1759.66.text: then please come for baptism as we stand and as we sign
